version_description:
在应用程序上实时关注 2021 年欧洲杯的所有比赛

*** 没有这个 1.05 版本，您将无法关注现场比赛 ***

***现场更正***
***现场表演的巨大优化***
*** Bug修复 ***

Follow all the Euro 2021 matches live on the app

*** WITHOUT THIS 1.06 VERSION YOU CANNOT FOLLOW LIVE MATCHES ***

*** New Live V2 ***
*** Huge improvement of live performance ***
*** Correction of live problems on Ipad ***
*** Account creation fixed ***
*** You can remove Ads ***
*** Bug fixes ***

Follow all the Euro 2021 matches live on the app

*** WITHOUT THIS 1.07 VERSION YOU CANNOT FOLLOW LIVE MATCHES ***

MULTI-LIVE
*** You can now select the live match ***
*** You can now change the quality of the live ***

*** Bug fixes ***
